Name: Vessel Knight

BodyParts.Name: Heart
BodyParts.Description: Prevents the Vessel Knight from rising again due to Black Sun Ritual and disables Defiance.

BodyParts.Name: Shield
BodyParts.Description: Can no longer shove foes. 2 Dust if destroyed.

BodyParts.Name: Darklight Blade Hilt
BodyParts.Description: The broken hilt can be sold for 3 Dust.

Actions.Name: Darklight Cleaver
Actions.Effects: Foe gains a stack of Malice.

Combos.Name: Darklight Splitter
Combos.Hit: [fray] and target gains a stack of Malice.
Combos.Effects: All foes in the area gain a stack of Malice.

Actions.Name: Great Bash
Actions.Description: Dash forward up to 3 spaces, then an adjacent foe is shoved 3 spaces.

PhasesDescription: The Knight switches to phase 2 when bloodied.

Actions.Name: Rage of Iz
Actions.Effects: The Vessel roars, and its foe feels the ground trembling beneath their feet. At the end of that character's turn, the knight summons either a pit or a height 1 terrain piece under that foe. The ground erupts in a blast 1 area effect centered on this terrain, dealing 3 damage to all characters.

Actions.Name: Damocles
Actions.Description: The knight chooses a character in range 3. At the end of the very next turn, if that character is still in range 3 of the knight, it teleports adjacent to them and may make the next of its Darklight attack series against them.

Interrupts.Name: Dispersal
Interrupts.Trigger: The knight is damaged by an ability.
Interrupts.Effects: The knight may teleport up to 4 spaces.

Actions.Name: Soul Cleaver
Actions.Effects: All foes in Aura 2 of the knight take 2 divine damage. Each time this ability is used again this combat, increase its damage by +2.
